c1.name: Splitting Gales
c1.descriptionRaw: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
c1.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.
c2.description:
Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

c3.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Hurricane of Freedom
c4.descriptionRaw: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.
c4.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c5.name: Concerto dal Cielo
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Storm of Defiance
c6.descriptionRaw:
Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
c6.description:
Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
